text: Georgia participated at the 2018 Summer Youth Olympics in Buenos Aires, Argentina from 6 October to 18 October 2018. ==Athletics== ==Basketball== Georgia qualified a boys' team based on the U18 3x3 National Federation Ranking. * Boys' tournament - 1 team of 4 athletes {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !rowspan=2|Event !colspan=5|Group stage !Quarterfinal !Semifinal
